name: GatherNetworkInfo.vbs Script Usage
description: Adversaries can abuse of C:\Windows\System32\gatherNetworkInfo.vbs script along with cscript.exe to gather information about the target
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*cscript.exe* AND process.command_line:*gatherNetworkInfo.vbs*)`
